byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: University of Chicago is set to announce Sequoia Capital chairman Michael Moritz and his wife Harriet Heyman have donated $50 million to help school expand programs that help low-income students.

headline.print_headline: Venture Capitalist’s Latest Gift: $50 Million to the University of Chicago
headline.main: University of Chicago to Get $50 Million From Venture Capitalist

snippet: In their latest donation to an educational institution, Michael Moritz and his wife, Harriet Heyman, are giving $50 million to the university.
lead_paragraph: In their latest donation to an educational institution, Michael Moritz and his wife, Harriet Heyman, are giving $50 million to the university.
